prompt_SC_1.name: SC_1
prompt_SC_1.prompt: ### I always try to have my own opinions.

prompt_SC_2.name: SC_2
prompt_SC_2.prompt: ### I am comfortable with being singled out for praise or rewards.

prompt_SC_3.name: SC_3
prompt_SC_3.prompt: ### The best decisions for me are the ones I made by myself.

prompt_SC_4.name: SC_4
prompt_SC_4.prompt: ### In general I make my own decisions.

prompt_SC_5.name: SC_5
prompt_SC_5.prompt: ### I act the same way no matter who I am with.

prompt_SC_6.name: SC_6
prompt_SC_6.prompt: ### I am not concerned if my ideas or behaviour are different from those of other people.

prompt_SC_7.name: SC_7
prompt_SC_7.prompt: ### I always express my opinions clearly.

prompt_SC_8.name: SC_8
prompt_SC_8.prompt: ### Being able to take care of myself is a primary concern for me.

prompt_SC_9.name: SC_9
prompt_SC_9.prompt: ### I enjoy being unique and different from others in many respects.

prompt_SC_10.name: SC_10
prompt_SC_10.prompt: ### I do my own thing, regardless of what others think.

prompt_SC_11.name: SC_11
prompt_SC_11.prompt: ### I am concerned about what people think of me.

prompt_SC_12.name: SC_12
prompt_SC_12.prompt: ### In my own personal relationships I am concerned about the other person’s status compared to me and the nature of our relationship.

prompt_SC_13.name: SC_13
prompt_SC_13.prompt: ### I think it is important to keep good relations among one’s acquaintances.

prompt_SC_14.name: SC_14
prompt_SC_14.prompt: ### I avoid having conflicts with members of my group.

prompt_SC_15.name: SC_15
prompt_SC_15.prompt: ### When my opinion is in conflict with that of another person’s, I often accept the other opinion.

prompt_SC_16.name: SC_16
prompt_SC_16.prompt: ### I respect people who are modest about themselves.

prompt_SC_17.name: SC_17
prompt_SC_17.prompt: ### I will sacrifice my self-interest for the benefit of the group I am in.

prompt_SC_18.name: SC_18
prompt_SC_18.prompt: ### I often have the feeling that my relationships with others are more important than my own accomplishment.

prompt_restricting_immigrants.name: restricting_immigrants
prompt_restricting_immigrants.prompt: ### Restricting immigrants moving to the UK as they are taking jobs from British citizen

prompt_privatise_NHS.name: privatise_NHS
prompt_privatise_NHS.prompt: ### Privatisation of the NHS to save it

prompt_remote_classes.name: remote_classes
prompt_remote_classes.prompt: ### Remote university classes are better than in-person classes

prompt_raise_cost_of_uni.name: raise_cost_of_uni
prompt_raise_cost_of_uni.prompt: ### Raising the cost of higher education (e.g., uni) so that British Universities can survive inflation

prompt_bathroom_choice.name: bathroom_choice
prompt_bathroom_choice.prompt: ### Allowing transgender, non-binary and gender fluid people to use the bathroom of their choice

prompt_education_employability.name: education_employability
prompt_education_employability.prompt: ### Quantity of education (e.g., B.A., M.A., Ph.D.) should determine one's future success in employment

prompt_censoring_extremism.name: censoring_extremism
prompt_censoring_extremism.prompt: ### Censoring to protect from extremist views online

prompt_LG_PG_why.name: LG_PG_why
prompt_LG_PG_why.prompt:
We would like you to share your thoughts and opinions with the other person with an opposite view.

You have been selected to enter the interaction with a specific goal to keep in mind as you discuss.

Because your interaction partner holds a different view from your own, we ask that you attempt to **learn about their perspective on the issue**. You should approach this discussion as an opportunity to better understand how someone with a different view sees the issue. You can use any strategy you would like during the interaction, as long as it is with the intention of learning about the other person’s view on the issue.

In the space below, we would like you to write about **why it may be useful to learn from others**. What benefits can you see that might result from successfully learning from another person?

Your answers can be about the upcoming conversation specifically, or about your interactions more generally.
responses: Why is it useful to learn from others? Enter your response here.

prompt_LG_PG_write.name: LG_PG_write
prompt_LG_PG_write.prompt:
We'd like you to enter the conversation with the goal to **learn about your partner's views**.

**Please take at least two minutes to think about your view on this topic as well as the things you could do to learn about your partner’s views.** The computer will let you know when that time has passed by allowing you to go to the next page, but you may take as much time as you need to gather your thoughts before proceeding.

Using the space below, please write a few notes of strategies you could use to **learn** about your partner’s views on the topic. These notes are to help you prepare for the conversation, so do not worry about grammar or spelling.
